items.title: Sphere, which raised a $4.3M seed as an edtech marketplace, pivots and raised a $21M Series A led by a16z to develop an AI tax compliance software service (Dominic-Madori Davis/TechCrunch)
items.summary:

Sphere, which raised a $4.3M seed as an edtech marketplace, pivots and raised a $21M Series A led by a16z to develop an AI tax compliance software service  —  As Nicholas Rudder built his last startup, an educational marketplace called ScholarSite, he kept running into the same problem: tax.

items.title: EcoFlow’s next 48-hour flash sale drops DELTA Pro 400W solar bundle to new $1,599 low (Reg. $3,999), more
items.summary:
EcoFlow has launched its final early Black Friday 48-hour flash sale before it kicks into its second phase on November 20, with up to 67% discounts on four offers – two power station bundles and two dual expansion battery bundles. The standout for folks wanting more versatile charging options is EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Portable Power Station with a 400W solar panel at $1,599 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $300. This bundle would normally run for $4,898 at full price here, while it keeps down at $3,999 at Amazon when in full, though Prime members have had the opportunity to score it under $2,000 for months now. Discounts over the year have only taken the costs on this bundle down as low as $1,799 up until today, with this greater 60% markdown taking $2,400 off the going rate (67% taking $3,299 off the MSRP) and landing it at a new all-time low price. Head below to learn more about it and the other offers lasting through November 19.

more…

It is, in fact, offering daily deals similar to Target and Best Buy’s Black Friday Deals of the Day, offering fresh lows on select items from its vast catalog. items.title: Syria inks deal with major energy firms to develop gas fields
items.summary: DAMASCUS, Nov. 18 (Xinhua) -- The state-run Syrian Petroleum Company has signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with international energy companies ConocoPhillips and Nova Terra Energy to develop several natural gas fields and launch new exploration programs, the Syrian energy authorities said Tuesday. items.title: Save up to 41% on Navee’s smart e-scooters, like the flagship ST3 Pro at its second-ever $660 low, more from $315
items.summary:
Navee has officially launched its Black Friday Sale, which is not only seeing up to 30% initial discounts across its lineup of e-scooters, but is also offering a bonus $100 sitewide savings using the code BFVIP at checkout. One notable returning low price during this sale is on the flagship ST3 Pro Smart Electric Scooter at $659.99 shipped, after using the promo code BFVIP at checkout, beating out its Amazon pricing by $100. It carries a $950 MSRP, but we usually see it keeping down between $760 and $850 on average, with today’s rate having only appeared once before back during July’s Prime Day event. Now, you’re getting a second chance to score $190 off the going rate (and $290 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked since it hit the market in January. Head below to learn more about this scooter that I cannot stop raving about after going hands-on in our review, as well as the massive lineup of deals we’re seeing across the brand’s e-scooters.

more…

items.title: Pakistan's textile exports increase nearly 4 pct in 4 months
items.summary: ISLAMABAD, Nov. 18 (Xinhua) -- Pakistan's textile exports surged by nearly 4 percent in the first four months of the current fiscal year 2025-2026, compared to the same period of the last fiscal year, the Pakistan Bureau of Statistics (PBS) said on Tuesday. Read full story

items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s G502 X Plus wireless gaming mouse in white down to $119.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This is regularly a $180 unit that has been holding close to full price recently, aside from a few dips into the $130 to $140 range. By clipping the on-page coupon, however, you can shave a solid $60 off its usual going rate, landing it within $5 of the lowest price we’ve tracked for this model in white. You can also get this in black, though it’s currently going for $129.99 shipped with a relatively lighter discount. Head below for more details.

items.title: Early Black Friday deal strikes latest Backbone Pro iPhone/Android USB-C gamepad down at $135 all-time low
items.summary:
Update: This Best Buy early Black Friday deal is still live – latest Backbone Pro iPhone/Android USB-C gamepad down at $134.99 shipped. Notably, the standard Backbone One 2nd-gen models are also starting at $60 right now. More details in the original post below

As part of its now live early Black Friday Doorbuster deals, Best Buy is offering the latest Backbone Pro wireless controller for $134.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year in May carrying a $170 price tag, and it hasn’t seen many discounts dropping it down from its full price. It saw its first deal last month when it hit $150, but today’s offer steps it up with an additional $15 off. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this pro-grade gamepad to date, and you’ll also find the brand’s standard Backbone One 2nd-gen models starting at $60 right now. Head below for more details.

The Switch 2-compatible Express microSD cards, as you probably already know, are almost always sold out – let alone discounted – so you might want to jump in now to snag these if you’ve been planning a storage upgrade for your Switch 2 before the holidays. items.title: Upgrade your Series X|S ahead of the giant Xbox Black Friday sale: WD’s official Expansion card hits best price of the year at $100
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops WD_BLACK’s 1TB C50 Storage Expansion Card for Xbox Series X|S to $99.99 shipped. Regularly $150, this 1TB expansion card is now seeing a straight-up $50 discount. Only once before today have we seen this Xbox storage drop below today’s discounted price, and it’s now within just $1 of that. This also happens to be the lowest we have seen it fetch this year, landing $10 below its previous 2025 low and making this a great time to cash in. You can also get this in 512GB and 2TB variants, and they’re both at $79.99 and $249.99 shipped right now. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Alienware’s 2025 model 34-inch 240Hz QD-OLED curved gaming monitor just hit a new all-time low at $150 off
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Alienware’s 34-inch 240Hz QD-OLED curved gaming monitor (AW3425DW) down to $649.99 shipped. This particular model debuted earlier this year in April carrying an $800 price tag, and it has only seen one major discount since then, with the rest being relatively smaller deals. Today’s deal, which is also matched directly at Dell as part of its ongoing Black Friday sale, shaves $150 off its usual going rate, landing it $30 below its previous all-time low. This monitor is loaded with great features to upgrade your overall gaming experience, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
